communityconfigurationexample-desc: Example of usage of Community Configuration extension
communityconfiguration-newcomershomepage: Define what are the Help links that you want new editors to go through.
communityconfiguration-helppanel-descrip: Customize Help panel settings to align with your community's requirements and define resources within it to assist and guide new editors.
communityconfiguration-helppanel-gehelpp: Namespaces with the help panel disabled in both reading and editing mode
Namespaces where the help panel is available in reading mode
Namespaces to include in the help panel's free text search for help
Where should questions from the help panel be directed?
Help desk page where questions should be posted from the help panel.
Where on the help desk page should new questions be posted?
communityconfiguration-NewcomersHomepage: Define what are the Help links that you want new editors to go through.
